titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3193) to provide for the acquisition and publication of data about crimes that manifest prejudice based on race, religion, sexual orientation, or ethnicity.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-617.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3193 (hate crime statistics).
